examples.explanation: Negation scopes over the locative relationship
Almost doing implies desire but not execution
Recent past implies action occurred before now
Ongoing for implies action during time period
Spanish gustar maps to NSM LIKE with reversed arguments
French plaire maps to NSM LIKE with reversed arguments

rules.name: Universal Quantifier Skeleton
rules.description: ALL(x, P(x)) ∧ Q(x) ⇒ ALL(x, P(x) ∧ Q(x))

rules.name: Existential Quantifier Skeleton
rules.description: SOME(x, P(x)) ∧ Q(x) ⇒ SOME(x, P(x) ∧ Q(x))

examples.explanation: Counterfactual: no cause implies no effect

Applied Almost Do Molecule: ALMOST_DO(x,a) → WANT(x,a) ∧ NOT(DO(x,a))
Applied Recent Past Molecule: RECENT_PAST(DO(x,a)) → DO(x,a) ∧ BEFORE(DO(x,a), NOW)
Applied Ongoing For Molecule: ONGOING_FOR(DO(x,a), duration) → DO(x,a) ∧ DURING(DO(x,a), duration)
